mickel.io
Class Console

java.lang.Object
  mickel.io.Console

public class Console
extends Object

The class provides a GUI alternative to the system console for text-based user input and output. Once invoked, this Console redirects the System.in, System.out, and System.err streams to channel through itself. Only one instance of the Console may exist.

In order to use this Console, simply invoke one of the three static methods. For example:

Console.show("My Console Window", 825, 600);

Method Summary
static void dispose()
          Closes this Console and returns the System.in, System.out, and System.err streams back to the standard system console.
static JTextPane getPane()
          Accesses a frameless text pane of the Console.
static void show()
          Factory method to create a default "Console Application" window.
static void show(String t)
          Factory method to create a console window with a custom title.
static void show(String t, int w, int h)
          Factory method to create a console window with a custom title, width, and height.

equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
